product_name: Backcountry Access Float 42 Avalanche Airbag Pack
long_description: Designed for pros, patrollers, guides and tourers for long days or overnights, the Float 42 features an inflatable airbag to help keep you at or near the surface of the snow during an avalanche.
short_description: Designed for pros, patrollers, guides and tourers for long days or overnights, the Float 42 features an inflatable airbag to help keep you at or near the surface of the snow during an avalanche.
